website_summaries.verdict: Just Cause 3 provides a satisfying over-the-top action experience that is guaranteed to thrill, even if it falls short in a few sub-categories.
pros: Just Cause 3 packs in a dizzying amount of exploding anarchy set across a beautiful and lush tropical island
The game's parachute and wingsuit combination makes for a thrilling way to get around the island
cons: The upgrading weapons and gear system is great on paper but occasionally flawed in execution
Some of the mission objectives can become tedious and feel like busywork
The game appears to suffer from some performance issues on consoles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun game that my son loves and to be honest, I wish they had something like this as I was growing up in which you were able to fly a helicopter, jet, drive a car, or boat or any other vehicle for that matter. Excellent game! What male wouldn't like to play a game in which the object is to blow things up?
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have never played a just cause game but this one was great the gameplay was really fun the story was ok and it definitely got repetitive but I didn't really care because it was so fun to play. The reason I'm rating it three stars is because the game disc was not locked in place and could get scratched. But besides that this game could easily get 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Austin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it could be called just explosions but it's fun with a good background story and entertaining characters. Hours of great game play. Language and situations are not too bad given the M rating it has...a word censor wold not continuously press the chime like they would in many titles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to addictive!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great game five stars but, it was so addictive that it felt like it was sucking the life out of me, I couldn’t think. I just kept on playing up to the point where an entire day felt like two hours and I was living my life through a video game. There is just so much to do in the game that it was very hard to stop playing, but it’s one of the best games I’ve ever come by, subtract stealing my soul it’s a good game
customer_reviews.author: Joy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Cool game but get's repetitive fast.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cool game and a lot of the game-play is really cool. The wing-suit is really fun and feels extremely fluid and I really love the tether. The only issue is the variety of weapons is very limited and after you've liberated a few provinces it's just rinse and repeat doing the same thing over and over again until you've done the whole map. It got kind of boring after a couple days. I found myself going back and playing other games instead of working to finish this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Deardorff

customer_reviews.title: If Bay, Tarantino, and Rodriguez made a movie together, it would be JC3.
customer_reviews.text: If Michael Bay, Quentin Tarantino, and Robert Rodriguez spent thirty seconds together to come up with a movie plot, and then made said movie. No real story: just massive explosions, gun fights, and crazy stunts. This is a fun and good looking game. It's perfect for people who don't have hours to dedicate to a RPG.
customer_reviews.author: Brent C. Delong

customer_reviews.title: BLOW STUFF UP!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game if you like blowin stuff up. The story is ehh, but I still get a thrill outta tethering a guy to a pressurized tank and sending that tank skywards. The load times and server issues have improved but should be better in my opinion. I don't mind though, mainly cause its just fund to shoot, crash, and blow stuff up. Oh and flying too, its fun.For those of you with sensitive ears there is some language but nothing compared to GTA 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great except for...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great, a few small glitches, but nothing game breaking. Grappling also works well (same with tethering). Wing suit takes some getting used to. Love the explosives. Flight is extremely smooth. Only one issue, when an explosion sends you up in the air,and you don't grapple one of two things will happen: 1, you go to almost no health or 2, you don't stand up for 5 seconds while enemies shoot you on the ground. But, if you are fast, you can decrease the chance of that happening.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble imagining a less remarkable entry into 3rd person gaming. Beyond the arcade-like employment of tethers and wing suits, which are novel but don't give you much substance, this is a lackluster, grainy repeat of every third world open adventure you've ever had. Low intensity, moderate graphics (which is a feat for maps this size, but still a fact), and action typically described as over the top and unpredictable driven by sloppy coding. Wait for the price break.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: My younger son (11yo) has played this game a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: My younger son (11yo) has played this game a ton. Third person and a lot of environment to explore, plenty of vehicles and weapons. The character is durable in-game so he doesn't die much unless you really blunder.
customer_reviews.author: Pregnant Nun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandbox game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sandbox game. Open world is enormous with tons of things to do. Can get a little repetitive but some many ways to cause carnage that it doesn't get old. Must play
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Has some fun mechanics that get repetitive very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Has some fun mechanics that get repetitive very quickly. Not much variety- shoot red stuff, die, shoot more red stuff until it turns blue. Worth perhaps 10 hours before it starts getting old.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tamburro

customer_reviews.title: Bought this Just Cause..
customer_reviews.text: This game has successfully pulled me away from every other game, and as a multiconsole player that's a huge feat. It offers a unique, unrestricted, over the top, experience that is truly addicting. The game play is simple but complex and the destruction is as satisfying as it is fun. Also grapple, parachute, wingsuit, combo; Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Shiro

customer_reviews.title: Good game, not enough variety
customer_reviews.text: It got really repetitive within the first couple of hours. I enjoy the action but I would error on the side of purchasing Saints Row genre when I look for this type of game again. The first patch fixed most of the long loading times but the game still wears out of new structures very quickly. The wing suit is a great addition and makes up for the lack of uniqueness between towns.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just having issues getting into this game, going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just having issues getting into this game, going to put it aside for a bit and come back to it...but for now, just feels a bit clunky for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jellyphish

customer_reviews.title: Huge open world map that hold hours and hours of fun. The controls can be frustrating and sluggish at ...
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining sandbox game, the story is weak and uneventful. Huge open world map that hold hours and hours of fun. The controls can be frustrating and sluggish at times, same with the camera. Overall, it's worth the purchase. If you abide by the $1 for hour rules for video games, it's well worth it as I've put in well over 60 hours into this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game if you like an open world, and blowing everything up.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this games it's hilarious all the crazy things you can do.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: but all in all a disappointment as it would be such a better game if ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller of this game is top notch, however my quarrel is with the game itself. This game simply put does not perform well on the PS4. I suggest anyone interested in purchasing do a bit of research and check out some of the reviews on how poorly this runs on the PS4. I ignored most of what I read, and low and behold experienced extremely low FPS while playing this game. It's barely playable, but all in all a disappointment as it would be such a better game if it did not have the FPS drop's that it does.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: When you want to watch the world burn, but ...
customer_reviews.text: When you want to watch the world burn, but are worn out on GTA, this is the game to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Moore

customer_reviews.title: It freezes a lot
customer_reviews.text: This game freezes a lot. Once your save file gets too big it crashes every 30 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sephiroth348

customer_reviews.title: Great Game. The possibilities are endless
customer_reviews.text: Great Game. The possibilities are endless. I was obsessed with uncharted 1-4 played them and beat them all. Was trying to find another game that could compare. I'm not really into online multiplayer so u can play this game In story mode. The destruction is incredible and very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: greyson caldarera

customer_reviews.title: Small issues, but still a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun...and that is the point of games. Really good graphics that do slow down occasionally, but nothing that breaks the game. Free play is a lot more fun than the missions on offer. If not for that and the slowdown, this game would rate higher.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved th digital download
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved th digital download! It is the full game too. Only downfall, it took about 5 hours to fully download. But it does give you the option to wander around and figure out all the controls while it is downloading.

customer_reviews.title: Moo Rico
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adored this game. It is beyond fun and I've played it through multiple times. The DLC was kinda fun but only so-so. If you're looking to blow off some steam and blow some s**t up, this is absolutely the game for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Baugh

customer_reviews.title: This game is amazing AND hilarious for free roam
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing AND hilarious for free roam, and INSANELY stylish with the action. Now, there a small few things I feel they should have kept from Just Cause 2, but I am still early in the game yet. Definitely a must for action fans
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Randell

customer_reviews.title: Pure joy in game form
customer_reviews.text: Always fun, the Just Cause franchise is back and while not as good as 2, manages to capture what made the previous entry great. Controls for ground vehicles are still terrible, but with the new wingsuit most vehicles have become set dressing.

customer_reviews.text: Seems like just a basic upgrade of JC2. Framerate lags bad though, and the game feels hollow, especially if youve played GTAV or other open world games. The plus is its much harder than JC2

I just spent $40 on a broken game. Thanks square enix.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the first 10 minutes or so of playing this ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first 10 minutes or so of playing this game. Your abilities are very cool and pretty unique (wingsuit, parachute, etc). However, the game gets boring quickly. Its always unclear what you need to be doing. I'll spend 30 minutes trying to find where the last item I need to destroy is because the game really doesn't tell you and the mission isn't over until I destroy said item. You basically seem to do the same thing over and over again. I know you eventually unlock more vehicles and weapons but even then I'm not sure the game is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: j.west

customer_reviews.text: The recent 1.02 Update made the frame rate drop to a point where its just unbearable to play.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Exactly as described and arrived lightning fast! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A game hobbled by its creators
customer_reviews.text: Just Case 2 was a blast to play. This game can be fun at times, but is hobbled by poor decisions and bugs. Although this is a single player game it requires a connection to Square Enix servers that frequently drop. Then there are the numerous Playstation 4 bugs that cause the application to quit (and you loose your progress). Finally, the graphics are so slow in some places you feel like you are playing in slow motions. Any amount of joy you get with this game is short-lived. I'd suggest waiting a year or two and pick this up on a sale or in the bargain bin. Simply not worth even the sale price of this game.
customer_reviews.author: Grog

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: My son dug into this immediately. Watching him master a very good game has been great fun!

customer_reviews.title: The game is so good

customer_reviews.title: New Rico voice ruins the game
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to enjoy this game. I put hundreds of hours into the previous game. Unfortunately, I found the new voice for Rico to be very very bad. I'm half Mexican and grew up near the Mexican border. The actor used to do the voice for Rico is obviously doing an over the top impression of a Mexican accent. He sounds like a Mexican radio DJ or a used car salesman. Rico went for a cool customer with witty super hero puns to a boisterous blabber mouth who tells bad dad jokes.

product_meta.title: Just Cause 3 - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 4| Edition:StandardThe Mediterranean republic of Medici is suffering under the brutal control of General Di Ravello, a dictator with an insatiable appetite for power. Enter Rico Rodriguez, a man on a mission to destroy the General's hold on power by any means necessary. With over 400 square miles of complete freedom from sky to seabed and a huge arsenal of weaponry, gadgets and vehicles, prepare to unleash chaos in the most creative and explosive ways you can imagine.
feature_bullets: Explore a Mediterranean island paradise with complete vertical freedom - skydive, BASE jump and free dive in an open world with virtually zero limits
Glide through the air and swoop across mountains with your Wingsuit giving a new way to rain death from above
Use your Grapple and Parachute to scale buildings, hijack vehicles, move quickly or tether objects together for creative new ways to cause Chaos
Cause massive chains of destruction in military bases, harbors, prisons, police stations and communications facilities to bring down a dictator
Arm yourself with a wide range of explosive weaponry from shotguns and missile launchers to tank-busters and air-strikes
